:mod:`LogColors.py` -- colors to be used in a log
===================================================

.. module:: LogColors
   :platform: Unix, Linux
   :synopsis: defines what colors will be used for an specific log
.. moduleauthor:: Jordi Carrillo <jordilin@jordiet.com>

LogColors class
-----------------

.. class:: LogColors
   
   Defines the colors that will be used to tail the logs.
   By default it defines the next colors:

   * warn = yellow
   * info = green
   * debug = black
   * error = magenta
   * fatal = red
   
   .. method:: parseConfig(configfile)

      Parses the config file containing user defined color levels.
      The config file must be specified in the following format:

      * warn = yellow
      * info = green
      * debug = black
      * error = magenta
      * fatal = red

      If any of the levels is missing, log4tailer will grab the default ones.
